annotations: 20+ years experienced scaffold builder/foreman seeking employment opportunity with a growing company to continue a successful career working safely and efficiently.
Operate terrain forklifts, Lull, Bobcats, electric pallet jack, 15ton Cherry Picker, Carry Deck, Mini Excavator, and some rigging experience

Â·Managed multiple crews, lining each crew for daily tasks. Gathered and ordered scaffold material. Build, demoing and revised of scaffolds. File and make inventory of daily tasks. Maintained employees time. Operated equipment when staging or moving material around for different jobsites. Communicated with contractors /employees and assured the crews had sufficient and correct personal protective equipment.
NCEER, NCEER PLUS, Osha 10 Hour, Scaffold User, Basic Plus, CPR Training, Forklift Cert, Core Curriculum, Fundamentals of Crew Leadership
